grails-app.services.grails.plugins.nimble.core
Class FacebookService

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.services.grails.plugins.nimble.core.FacebookService

class FacebookService

Provides methods for interacting with Facebook API, currently authentication focused but to be extended to support a wider range of functionality.

author:
Bradley Beddoes

void nimbleInit()

Integrates with extended Nimble bootstrap process, sets up Facebook Environment once all domain objects etc have dynamic methods available to them.

private boolean validateSignature(def cookies)

Inspects cookies associated with user session per: http://wiki.developers.facebook.com/index.php/Verifying_The_Signature To determine if their authentication as advised by Facebook is valid.

Provides an instance of a generic Facebook API client
return:
a client instance

getFacebookClient

FacebookJsonRestClient getFacebookClient(java.lang.String sessionID)
Provides an instance of a Facebook API client scoped to the supplied session
param:
sessionID The users current sessionID on Facebook
return:
A client instance

isLoggedIn

public def isLoggedIn(def cookies)
Determines if the user has been successfully logged in via remote facebook servers. Does not indicate the presence of a Nimble based session.
param:
cookies An array of cookies present in the users web session
return:
True if the users Facebook session is valid

nimbleInit

public void nimbleInit()
Integrates with extended Nimble bootstrap process, sets up Facebook Environment once all domain objects etc have dynamic methods available to them.

validateSignature

private boolean validateSignature(def cookies)
Inspects cookies associated with user session per: http://wiki.developers.facebook.com/index.php/Verifying_The_Signature To determine if their authentication as advised by Facebook is valid.
param:
cookies An array of cookies present in the users web session
return:
True if the users Facebook session is valid
